panels.title: Devices Up
panels.description: How many devices are currently reachable.

targets.query:
from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "device_health" and r["_field"] == "status")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["site"] =~ /${site:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device_name"] =~ /${device:regex}/)
  |> group(columns: ["device_name"])
  |> last()
  |> filter(fn: (r) => exists r._value and r._value == 1)
  |> count(column: "_value")

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "device_health" and r["_field"] == "status")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["site"] =~ /${site:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device_name"] =~ /${device:regex}/)
  |> group(columns: ["device_name"])
  |> last()
  |> filter(fn: (r) => exists r._value and r._value == 0)
  |> count(column: "_value")

panels.title: Latency Trend (ms)
panels.description: Lower is better. Spikes mean slower response.

targets.query:
from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "device_health" and r["_field"] == "latency")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["site"] =~ /${site:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device_name"] =~ /${device:regex}/)
  |> group(columns: ["device_name"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "device_health" and r["_field"] == "status")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["site"] =~ /${site:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device_name"] =~ /${device:regex}/)
  |> group(columns: ["device_name"])
  |> last()

panels.title: Uptime (last 24h)
panels.description: How often the device was reachable.

targets.query:
from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "device_health" and r["_field"] == "status")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["site"] =~ /${site:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device_name"] =~ /${device:regex}/)
  |> group(columns: ["device_name"])
  |> mean()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: r._value * 100.0 }))

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "device_health" and r["_field"] == "latency")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["site"] =~ /${site:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device_name"] =~ /${device:regex}/)
  |> group(columns: ["device_name"])
  |> mean()
  |> sort(columns: ["_value"], desc: true)
  |> limit(n: 10)
  |> keep(columns: ["device_name", "_value"])
  |> rename(columns: { _value: "avg_latency_ms" })

panels.title: Site Avg Latency
panels.description: Average across all devices at each site.

targets.query:
from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "device_health" and r["_field"] == "latency")
  |> group(columns: ["site"])
  |> mean()

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "device_health" and r["_field"] == "status")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["site"] =~ /${site:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device_name"] =~ /${device:regex}/)
  |> group(columns: ["device_name"])
  |> last()
  |> filter(fn: (r) => exists r._value and r._value == 0)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "device_name", "site", "_value"])
  |> rename(columns: { _value: "status" })

 schema.tagValues(bucket: v.defaultBucket, tag: "site", predicate: (r) => r._measurement == "device_health")

 schema.tagValues(bucket: v.defaultBucket, tag: "device_name", predicate: (r) => r._measurement == "device_health")
